thread.title: Mississippi Association of Educators, pushing #Initiative42, backing mostly Democrat candidates
thread.title_full: Mississippi Association of Educators, pushing #Initiative42, backing mostly Democrat candidates

author: Frank Corder
title: Mississippi Association of Educators, pushing #Initiative42, backing mostly Democrat candidates
text: Mississippi Association of Educators, pushing #Initiative42, backing mostly Democrat candidates by Frank Corder The Mississippi Association of Educators are pushing hard for #Initiative42 and now they are recommending candidates. If you don't think this is a partisan, Democrat effort, just look at the Democrats they are endorsing. 42 isn't about funding or children at its core; it's about political power being shifted away from the Republican controlled Legislature to a more Democrat friendly venue in the court system. See for yourself: Posted October 21, 2015 - 5:32 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
